about.content:
STRAPPD is a mobile app that can help people in need to locate services where they can find Food, Shelter, Health, Resources and Work. Users can switch from List View to Map View and Vice versa and can filter services that are just open from the side menu. Users can click on any of the services to get detailed info like description, contact info, transit directions and schedule for that particular service.

If you would like to contact any of the service directly, you can click on the Flag button. Users can click on Kudos button to show appreciation for the services they like. If you want to mark any service for future reference, click on the star icon at the top right in respective service detail page to see them in My Favorites page. Data for STRAPPD is collected from various sources and is updated constantly.

If you are doing community service and are interested in listing your service, you can add/manage a service by signing up and clicking on login from the side menu. You can also update the number of beds available for shelters that you add. All the details entered by the community service for the first time will take some time to get approved before getting added to the list. If you have any questions or see information that is not up to date, please report changes using Give Feedback in side menu. This app works better in Chrome if accessed via web browser.

terms.content:
STRAPPD provides its services on this app subject to the following terms of use. We may periodically change the terms, so please check back from time to time. By accessing this app, you agree to these terms. You should use this app only as a directory to locate Food, Shelter, Health, Work and other Resources. STRAPPD reserves the right to add, modify or delete services or feedback contained in this App at any time without any liability.

STRAPPD disclaims any liability from the use of this app and all the info is provided as-is with no warranties. Services listed on this app are not affiliated with STRAPPD. You agree that under no circumstances STRAPPD will be liable for any loss or damage of any kind whatsoever that occur from the use of this app. The links provided within the app to third party sites are not under our control and it doesnâ€™t mean any endorsement nor are we responsible for the contents in these links.

STRAPPD uses the location of your mobile devices to show the services that are closest to you. Apart from location, STRAPPD may also collect information about you that you disclose through feedback form. By using this app, you authorize us to access your location, feedback and any such information. Service providers that are listed in the app may help ensure in keeping the details up-to-date. We try to make sure that the information is up-to-date, however STRAPPD is not responsible for any misinformation in this app.
